Who: RODIMUS PRIME, SCOURGE, SCORPONOK, CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA,
NIGHTRAZOR, Tuscon, Nightshift, Darkhawk, Hydras, Perceptor
Location: Black Fortress - Hallways

As Hydras and Perceptor came around the corner so did Nightrazor, his
quick scanning optics taking in the entire scene at a glance.

Cyclonus straightened as most of the Predacons and Decepticons were
now here in the hallway facing down Tuscon, Rodimus and Nightshift.
"Maximals! Autobots!" Cyclonus' voice boomed out. "There are only
three of you against all of us!" Cyclonus continued as he gestured to
the obvious disparity in numbers.

Cyclonus' shoulder mounted cannons glowed but were not firing. "If you
surrender now perhaps Hydras will have mercy on you and end your
existance quickly. To fight on is only an exercise in futility."

Scourge as per his habit stepped up behind Cyclonus to back him up.

Deepstryke turned his weapons on Tuscon and Rodimus simultaniously,
although with Cyclonus pausing, he followed suit.

Phobia leaned against the wall present as small a profile as possible
as she looked for an open shot.

Nightrazor on the other hand, after taking a moment to observed
shimmered and then vanished from sight.

On the otherside of the fight, standing near Tuscon, Rodimus glanced
at Nightshift and then over at Tuscon, "If you have a plan we had
better get it moving. This is going south fast." he said in a fierce
whisper to Tuscon.

Rodimus looked back at the Decepticons and Predacons as he held his
weapon steady on Hydras, "If we fall," Rodimus said quietly to himself
under his breath, "then Hydras falls with us."

(TAG)

Preston
